amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the DCI may transfer the funds authorized by section 303 of the bill to the agencies within the National Foreign Intelligence Program for the automatic declassification of records over 25 years old.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 12 in the Congressional Record of May 21, 1996, to allow the Director of the CIA to transfer funds generally authorized for document declassification to National Foreign Intelligence Program agencies for the purpose of declassifying documents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Combest amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
